modmenu.descriptionTranslation.my-totem-: Simple Fabric mod which replaces all totems with player dolls. Just rename your totem to player's nickname in anvil to use it's skin!
my-totem-doll.modmenu.title: &lMy Totem Doll
my-totem-doll.modmenu.no_config_library_:
You need to install &6&lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]&f to open My Totem Doll Configuration Screen

&a&lOpen &6&lYACL &a&lModrinth page?
my-totem-doll.modmenu.old_config_library:
Your &6&lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]&f with version %s is outdated for configuration My Totem Doll. Please update &6&lYACL&f with version %s or higher.

&a&lOpen &6&lYACL &a&lModrinth page?
my-totem-doll.modmenu.group.main.name: &lMain
my-totem-doll.modmenu.group.main.descrip: Main settings of My Totem Doll Mod.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.mod_enabled: If enabled, all totems will be replaced with player dolls; if disabled, won't.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.debug_log_e: If enabled, additional info will be logged to console for debugging; if disabled, won't.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.group.threads.name: &lThreads
my-totem-doll.modmenu.group.threads.desc: Threads settings which may affect performance!
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.executor_th: Sets how many threads will be allocated for mod tasks, such as downloading skins. Mainly used for downloading skins.
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.scale.name: Scale
my-totem-doll.modmenu.option.standard_do: Enter the player's name in field "Skin Value" to apply his skin to doll.
Each doll will have the skin of the player holding it. If no one is holding the doll, will be used Steve.
Enter the link to the skin in field "Skin Value" to apply your skin to doll.
Enter the path to the skin in field "Skin Value" to apply your skin to doll.
my-totem-doll.tags.info.title: &lWhat is this?
my-totem-doll.tags.info.text:
This is the &eDoll Tags Menu&f.
In this menu you can find list of &ebuttons&f.
By clicking on the buttons, you can &echange appearance&f of your totem. For example: &eDisable/enable certain parts&f, &eselect custom model&f, etc.
my-totem-doll.tags.tips.title: &e&lTips!
my-totem-doll.tags.tips.text:
&e&l1. &rHold &7[Shift]&r while hovering over a totem to see its status. Always enabled in anvil by default.

 &e&l2. &rUse command &7/my-totem-doll refresh [...]&r to refresh doll skins.
my-totem-doll.tags.title: &7Doll Tags:
my-totem-doll.welcome_screen.title: Welcome screen
my-totem-doll.welcome_screen.text:
&lWelcome Screen&r

It looks like you're launching the game with the &lMy Totem Doll mod&r for the first time.
Which standard model would you like to use for your totems?
my-totem-doll.tag_menu.title: Tags
my-totem-doll.tag_menu.custom_models.tit:
Custom Models
 
&7[Shift]&r + &7[Scroll]&r to change
tooltip size
&7[Ctrl]&r + &7[Scroll]&r to change
model size in tooltip
